attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After reading the article in the Guarding about Patrick Mercer and his comments about ginger people. "a chap with red hair would get a hard time - a far harder time than a black man in fact."

I request that all equal opportunities forms have the option of "being ginger" being included and "red haired" people are classed as a subbranch of ethnic minorities and being given the same status of other ethnic minorities and there issues are given equal status, with respect to other ethnic minorities groups.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
